about_the_game: In this spell-crafting first-person shooter, you'll find yourself transported to a medieval world full of magic and danger. As a powerful wizard, you'll use your skills to cast devastating spells while battling through hordes of enemies using fast-paced, boomer shooter gameplay. With a variety of spells at your disposal, you'll be able to customize your loadout to suit your playstyle and take on increasingly difficult challenges. Whether you prefer to rain fireballs from above or blast your enemies with powerful lightning bolts, this game offers endless possibilities for creating unique and exciting combat experiences. So gear up, master your spells, and get ready to take on the medieval world like never before!

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts scenes of fantasy violence and gore. This includes blood and dismembering demons or other fantasy like creatures.

detailed_description: In this spell-crafting first-person shooter, you'll find yourself transported to a medieval world full of magic and danger. As a powerful wizard, you'll use your skills to cast devastating spells while battling through hordes of enemies using fast-paced, boomer shooter gameplay. With a variety of spells at your disposal, you'll be able to customize your loadout to suit your playstyle and take on increasingly difficult challenges. Whether you prefer to rain fireballs from above or blast your enemies with powerful lightning bolts, this game offers endless possibilities for creating unique and exciting combat experiences. So gear up, master your spells, and get ready to take on the medieval world like never before!
name: Protos Magos Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 2.3 GHz Quad Core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Eight core 3.5 GHz Quad Core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2080or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Unleash powerful spells in a medieval-themed boomer shooter and blast through waves of enemies. Customize your loadout and explore a vast world full of danger and magic.
